name: Cheese Margherita
description: A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping

name: Corn & Cheese
description: Indulge in the harmonious blend of savory Cheese and the sweetness of Golden Corn

name: Farmhouse
description: Check out this mouth-watering overload of crunchy, crisp capsicum, succulent mushrooms, and fresh tomatoes

name: Chicken Dominator
description: Treat your taste buds with Double Pepper Barbecue Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Chicken Tikka & Grilled Chicken Rashers

name: Chicken Golden Delight
description: Mmm! Barbeque chicken with a topping of golden corn loaded with extra cheese. Worth its weight in gold!

name: Chicken Fiesta
description: Immerse in the flavors of perfectly grilled chicken rashers, fiery peri-peri chicken, and the crunch of onions and capsicum

name: Indian Tandoori Paneer
description: It is hot. It is spicy. It is oh-so-Indian. Tandoori paneer with capsicum I red paprika I mint mayo

name: Mexican Green Wave
description: Pizza loaded with crunchy onions, crisp capsicum, tomatoes and jalapeno with liberal sprinkling of exotic Mexican herbs.

name: Peppy Paneer
description: Revel in the succulent goodness of chunky paneer, the crisp freshness of capsicum, and the fiery kick of spicy red pepper.

name: Indi Chicken Tikka
description: The wholesome flavour of tandoori masala with Chicken tikka I onion I red paprika I mint mayo

name: Nonveg Supreme
description: Supreme delight of Black Olives, Onions, Grilled Mushrooms, Pepper BBQ Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Grilled Chicken Rashers

name: Pepper BBQ Chicken
description: Savory bites of pepper barbecue chicken meet the sweet crunch of onions in a perfect harmony of flavors
